name: Urban HIV Telemedicine Program
description: Through real-time, confidential videoconferencing with UCSF 360 providers, patients can receive expert HIV care, nutrition counseling, pharmacy information, mental health care, and other specialty services from their local clinic or from home using a phone, computer, or tablet and a free app.
fullDescription: Through real-time, confidential videoconferencing with UCSF 360 providers, patients can receive expert HIV care, nutrition counseling, pharmacy information, mental health care, and other specialty services from their local clinic or from home using a phone, computer, or tablet and a free app.
whatTheyOffer: Through real-time, confidential videoconferencing with UCSF 360 providers, patients can receive expert HIV care, nutrition counseling, pharmacy information, mental health care, and other specialty services from their local clinic or from home using a phone, computer, or tablet and a free app.
howToGetIt: Call our front desk at (415) 353-2119. If you are a new patient, please ask for the New Patient Coordinator.
